name: Clear: Atarashii Kaze no Fuku Oka de
synopsis: The story is set on the island of Harukajima. Kōichi Yukino used to live on this island, but moved to Tokyo as a child. Kōichi comes back from Tokyo to this very ordinary and small island to live with his grandfather. Kōichi feels often lonely because he is "different from other people". He gradually begins to interact with the girls in his school. Will he find friendship and love?
